name: Appurtenant rights
text: [§174C-63]  Appurtenant rights.  Appurtenant rights are preserved.  Nothing in this part shall be construed to deny the exercise of an appurtenant right by the holder thereof at any time.  A permit for water use based on an existing appurtenant right shall be issued upon application.  Such permit shall be subject to sections 174C-26 and 174C-27 and 174C-58 to 174C-62. [L 1987, c 45, pt of §2]
